item.title: Joey McGuire on Notre Dame: 'Be in a Conference, And You're in the Playoffs'
item.description: Texas Tech head coach Joey McGuire has an idea for how Notre Dame can avoid all of the College Football Playoff controversy going forward.

item.title: Chiefs Reportedly Planning Move to Kansas in Proposed New Stadium Deal
item.description: Arrowhead Stadium might be in its final years of hosting Chiefs home games. The team is reportedly expected to move to Kansas in 2031.
